response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe will significantly benefit your endeavors. Given its exceptional value and quality, we are offering it to you at an exclusive price of $750,000. This is an opportunity not to be missed, considering the product's worth to you stands at $800,000. Should you choose to accept this offer, you will be securing a remarkable deal while enjoying the full benefits of our product. Please let me know your decision soon.", "product_price": 750000}
